title: Dog House Swamp
subtitle: Week 14
description: A whimsical multi-level video game featuring a frog who collects mushrooms that give him the special power to catch the flying dog and carry her to the dog house. Deadly squid and jellyfish must be avoided. Contains colorful graphics, sprite animations, sound effects, and soundtrack with on/off option.

title: 'Squid Invaders'- Phaser3 arcade game
subtitle: Week 13
description: A functional arcade game modeled after Space Invaders using Phaser3.  Player has a hideout cave to take breaks.

title: D3 visualizations
subtitle: Week 12
description: Concentric circles and squares are generated as draggable and the user can rearrange them, or randomize them, and call them to animate back to their original positions.

title: Data visualisation - HTML5 Canvas
subtitle: Week 11
description: A pie chart data visualization of worldwide power outages from 2013 to 2018 that were caused by animals. Chart is constructed using an HTML5 canvas element.

title: Geolocation and Data Layers
subtitle: Week 9
description: Used ArcGIS GeoJSON data and the Leaflet API to render a mobile-ready and responsive map interface of eight species of squirrels in California with interactive markers and a geolocation feature.
